name: Grandpa and Me
description:
For some reason, the usually grumpy grandpa seems really excited about exploring the nearby cave. Due to him being our babysitter we got no other choice but to obey. Now it's time for to work together to get out of the cave safely. 

Hopefully without alerting mom. 

All assets was done for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Controls:
Q  =  Swap  Character
A  /  D  =  Left  /  Right
W  /  Space  =  Jump
F  =  Pick  Up  /  Throw
S  =  Drop
R  =  Restart  Level
Mouse  =  Aim  &  Shoot
H = Help
